title: Helping Amazon ECS customers specify restart policies programmatically
description: To call an Amazon Web Services (AWS) API, a customer passes a request. The API, in most cases, returns a JSON response. The request and response JSON bodies can contain complex objects comprised of multiple parameters. These complex structures are called data types. When documenting APIs at AWS, I was responsible for the descriptions of data types and their constituent parameters. The following example in my portfolio showcases how I handled descriptions for an Amazon ECS data type called RestartPolicy.
